definitions.definition: To make quiet ; to calm ; to reduce to a state of peace; to dispel (anger or hatred).
examples: to appease the tumult of the ocean

definitions.definition: To come to terms with; to adapt to the demands of.
examples: They appeased the angry gods with burnt offerings.

main_definition: To make quiet ; to calm ; to reduce to a state of peace; to dispel (anger or hatred).
secondary_definitions: To come to terms with; to adapt to the demands of.
